meanings.sent1: The teacher preexempted the students from the final exam.
meanings.sent2: She always preexempts herself from doing the dishes.
meanings.sent3: The cat preexempted the dog from entering its territory.
meanings.sent4: The early bird preexempts the competition by arriving first.
meanings.sent5: By preexempting any delays, we ensured an on-time arrival.

meanings.sent1: The preexempted students were allowed to leave early.
meanings.sent2: She felt relieved to be preexempted from the boring meeting.
meanings.sent3: The preexempted cake was saved for the birthday celebration.
meanings.sent4: The preexempted seats were reserved for VIP guests.
meanings.sent5: The preexempted items were set aside for special customers.
